document_title: Undescended testicles: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Abdominal ultrasound or magnetic resonance imaging (MRI): These are low to high exploration methods to determine the exact location of the undescended testicle. In addition, these methods also help doctors detect other abnormalities of the testicles such as calcification of testicular parenchyma, testicular tumors...; Chromosomal testing: This test depends on the case, to detect cases of unknown gender; Tumor marker tests: αFP, β-HCG, LDH should be performed to detect malignant tumors.
subsection_title: tinh hoan lac cho.json. Diagnostic method
subsection_data:
tinh hoan lac cho.json. Diagnostic method
Abdominal ultrasound or magnetic resonance imaging (MRI): These are low to high exploration methods to determine the exact location of the undescended testicle. In addition, these methods also help doctors detect other abnormalities of the testicles such as calcification of testicular parenchyma, testicular tumors...; Chromosomal testing: This test depends on the case, to detect cases of unknown gender; Tumor marker tests: αFP, β-HCG, LDH should be performed to detect malignant tumors.
